scripts.build-mac: webpack;electron-packager . gameplatform --overwrite --asar --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName="Department of Biomedical Engineering - PolyU" --version-string.ProductName="BME Rehabilitation"
scripts.build-win: webpack;electron-packager . gameplatform --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName="Department of Biomedical Engineering - PolyU" --version-string.ProductName="BME Rehabilitation"
